subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: It was Tim Abromaitis and Ben Hansbrough (15) who got the best looks in Notre Dame’s motion offense, and they made the Zips pay with 14 and 15 points respectively.
snippet: It was Tim Abromaitis and Ben Hansbrough (15) who got the best looks in Notre Dame’s motion offense, and they made the Zips pay with 14 and 15 points respectively.
